segments.text: From where I'm standing, I see the entire kitchen layout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is facing away, towel in hand on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is full and overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, pooling at her feet unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to make the floor so slippery soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching high for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is all stretched out, balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and down he goes, plate and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eager, palm open for her cookie reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're ignoring the rules, sneaking treats like little rebels.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light, showing the tidy yard beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, hazards are piling up without anyone knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes me worry about what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron is getting splashed, yet she polishes on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before it's a full catastrophe.
segments.speaker: PAR
